description: GET request that returns stacking pool member details for a given pool (delegator) principal
title: PoolDelegationsResponse

limit.description: The number of Stackers to return

offset.description: The number to Stackers to skip (starting at `0`)

stacker.description: The principal of the pool member that issued the delegation

pox_addr.description: The pox-addr value specified by the stacker in the delegation operation

amount_ustx.description: The amount of uSTX delegated by the stacker

burn_block_unlock_height.description: The optional burnchain block unlock height that the stacker may have specified

block_height.description: The block height at which the stacker delegation transaction was mined at

tx_id.description: The tx_id of the stacker delegation operation
